short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension for sending SMS & WhatsApp messages from any website using the CRM Messaging API.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Do you ever find yourself constantly switching between apps and websites just to send a simple message? It can be a real productivity killer, not to mention a major source of frustration.

But what if there was a better way? What if you could send SMS and WhatsApp messages from any website without ever leaving your browser? Well, now you can, thanks to this amazing Chrome extension!

With this extension, you'll have access to the powerful CRM Messaging API, allowing you to send messages securely and reliably from any website. It's like having your own personal messaging assistant right at your fingertips!

Imagine being able to communicate with clients, colleagues, or loved ones without ever having to leave the website you're on. That's the power of this incredible tool. It's simple to use, yet incredibly effective, making it the perfect solution for anyone who wants to streamline their messaging process and boost their productivity.

So why settle for juggling multiple apps and websites when you could have it all in one convenient location? Install this extension today and start enjoying the benefits of seamless messaging. Your productivity - and your sanity - will thank you for it!
